name: Paws & Claws: Marine Rescue
overview: Make a difference at your very own Paws & Claws Marine Rescue as you diagnose, treat and care for injured animals. Release the healthy animals back into the wild to swim and roam freely! Features • Welcome and treat 7 marine animals including penguins, dolphins, seals and baby polar bears at your clinic. • Search the sea for injured animals aboard your very own Marine Rescue boat. • Use the tools the experts use including an x-ray machine, microscope, stethoscope and check oxygen levels. • Care for injured animals and nurse them back to health, paying attention to each of their very special needs.
